aboutPage.title: Career journey
paragraphs: Passionate about IT from a young age, and after several years in administration with no real career progression, I retrained in web development.
I started by self-teaching, then joined the O'Clock school to deepen and expand my skills. The program was divided into three parts.
The first three months were dedicated to learning the fundamentals of development in JavaScript, followed by a month of specialization in React.
The final month was devoted to the development of a professional project, in which I was a Front-End developer.

contactPage.title: Stay in Touch !
contactPage.text: If you want to contact me, don't hesistate to send me a mail or give me a phone call !
